Write-Up Text: People are taking to social media to discuss Australian politics regarding welfare and taxation with a mix of criticism and approval. A controversial policy from Julia Gillard's era regarding single parenting payments may be reversed in the upcoming budget and many people seem to be pleased. There is also debate around taxation policies pertaining to energy and oil companies with some commenting that Australia falls behind other countries in this area. Some people have expressed concern that issues like family violence may be exacerbated by changes in welfare policies. Some also urge politicians to address concerns important to the public or face the possibility of losing voters to alternative parties.
